DoK (Age of Sigmar) [4,540pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** (Order - Daughters of Khaine) [4,540pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [2,140pts]

      • Bloodwrack Medusa [140pts]

        Selections: 1. Ruby Ring, 2. Rune of Ulgu, 4. Ignax's Scales, 4. The Withering, 5. Mistress of Poisons, 5. Thousand and One Dark Blessings, General

        Categories: BLOODWRACK MEDUSA, HERO, WIZARD, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, MELUSAI, Leader, Artefact, General

        Artefact: Ignax's Scales, Ruby Ring, Rune of Ulgu, Thousand and One Dark Blessings, Command Trait: Mistress of Poisons, Magic: Bloodwrack Medusa, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Enfeebling Foe, Mystic Shield, The Withering, Unit: Bloodwrack Medusa, Unit Abilities: Bloodwrack Stare, Weapon: Bloodwrack Spear, Bloodwrack Stare, Tail of Serpents, Whisperclaw


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Ignax's Scales Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to the bearer. On a 4+ the wound is negated.
        Ruby Ring In your hero phase, you can pick the closest enemy unit within 18" of the bearer and roll a dice. On a 5+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If two or more enemy units are equally close to the bearer, you can pick any of them.
        Rune of Ulgu The bearer knows one additional spell from the Lore of Shadows (pg 54).
        Thousand and One Dark Blessings Add 1 to save rolls for the bearer. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p52
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Mistress of Poisons Add 1 to the Damage characteristics of melee weapons wielded by this general. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p51
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Bloodwrack Medusa 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Enfeebling Foe
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Enfeebling Foe 5If successfully cast, pick a unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from wound rolls for that unit in the combat phase.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        The Withering 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Until the start of your next hero phase, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks that target that unit. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p54
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Bloodwrack Medusa 8"685+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bloodwrack Stare When making a Bloodwrack Stare attack, pick a unit that is visible to this unit and roll a dice for each model in that unit that is within range; for each roll of 5+ the unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Bloodwrack Spear Melee2"23+3+-1D3
        Bloodwrack Stare Missile10"*****
        Tail of Serpents Melee2"D64+4+-1
        Whisperclaw Melee1"43+3+-1

      • Bloodwrack Shrine [220pts]

        Selections: 2. Cursed Blade, 2. Thermalrider Cloak, 3. The Mirror Glaive, 4. Purefire Brazier, 4. Terrifying Beauty, 4. The Withering, General

        Categories: AELF, ORDER, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, MELUSAI, HERO, WIZARD, BLOODWRACK MEDUSA, BLOODWRACK SHRINE, Leader, Behemoth, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Cursed Blade, Purefire Brazier, The Mirror Glaive, Thermalrider Cloak, Command Trait: Terrifying Beauty, Damage Table: WoundTable0, WoundTable1, WoundTable2, WoundTable3, WoundTable4, WoundTable5, Magic: Bloodwrack Shrine, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Enfeebling Foe, Mystic Shield, The Withering, Unit: Bloodwrack Shrine, Unit Abilities: Aura of Agony, Bladed Impact, Bloodwrack Stare, Weapon: Bloodwrack Spear, Bloodwrack Stare, Shrinekeepers' Goadstaves, Tail of Serpents, Whisperclaw


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Cursed Blade Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons. Add 1 to hit rolls made for that weapon. In addition, each time a hit roll of 7+ is made for that weapon, the target suffers 1 mortal wound instead of the normal damage. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p52
        Purefire Brazier In your shooting phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 9" of the bearer. On a 5+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        The Mirror Glaive Each time the bearer unbinds an enemy spell, they can immediately attempt to cast either the Mystic Shield or Arcane Bolt spells as if it were your hero phase. Your opponent cannot attempt to unbind this spell if the casting roll is successful.
        Thermalrider Cloak Add 4 to the bearer’s Movement characteristic. In addition, the bearer may fly.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Terrifying Beauty Subtract 1 from the hit rolls of attacks that target this general. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p51
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        WoundTable0 Wounds SufferedMoveGoadstavesAura of Agony
        WoundTable1 0-26"62+
        WoundTable2 3-55"52+
        WoundTable3 6-84"43+
        WoundTable4 9-103"34+
        WoundTable5 11+2"25+
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Bloodwrack Shrine 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Enfeebling Foe
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Enfeebling Foe 5If successfully cast, pick a unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from wound rolls for that unit in the combat phase.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        The Withering 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Until the start of your next hero phase, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks that target that unit. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p54
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Bloodwrack Shrine *1385+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aura of Agony Bloodwrack Shrines emit an aura that wracks enemies with waves of agony. Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 7" of any friendly Bloodwrack Shrines at the start of your hero phase. If the dice roll equals or beats the score listed on the damage table above, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds as pure agony courses through them.
        Bladed Impact Roll a dice if this model ends a charge move within 1" of any enemy units. On a 2+ the nearest enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Bloodwrack Stare When making a Bloodwrack Stare attack, pick a unit that is visible to this unit and roll a dice for each model in that unit that is within range; for each roll of 5+ the unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Bloodwrack Spear Melee2"23+3+-1D3
        Bloodwrack Stare Missile10"*****
        Shrinekeepers' Goadstaves Melee2"*3+3+-1
        Tail of Serpents Melee2"D64+4+-1
        Whisperclaw Melee1"44+3+-1

      • Hag Queen [90pts]

        Categories: AELF, HERO, PRIEST, HAG QUEEN, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, Leader

        Prayer: Rune of Khaine, Touch of Death, Wrath of Khaine, Unit: Hag Queen, Unit Abilities: Priestess of Khaine, Witchbrew, Weapon: Blade of Khaine


        Prayer Description Ref
        Rune of Khaine This model's Blade of Khaine has a Damage characteristic of D3 instead of 1 until your next hero phase.
        Touch of Death Pick a unit within 3" of this model and then hide a dice in one of your hands. Your opponent must pick a hand; if that hand is holding the dice, the unit you picked suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Wrath of Khaine Pick a friendly AVATAR OF KHAINE on the battlefield – until your next hero phase, it is now Animated.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Hag Queen 6"585+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Priestess of Khaine In your hero phase, this model can pray once. If it does, pick a prayer it knows and roll a dice. On a result of 1 this model is found unworthy and suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 2 nothing happens. On a 3+ the prayer is successful and its effect takes place.
        Witchbrew Distilled from the blood of Slaughter Queens, witchbrew drives the imbiber into such an ecstasy of destruction that they will fight on in the face of impossible odds. In your hero phase, you can pick a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit within 3" of this model to drink witchbrew. If you do, then until your next hero phase you can re-roll failed wound rolls for that unit’s melee weapons, and you do not need to take battleshock tests for the unit.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Blade of Khaine Melee1"43+4+-11

      • Hag Queen on Cauldron of Blood [300pts]

        Categories: AELF, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, TOTEM, HERO, PRIEST, WITCH AELVES, HAG QUEEN, AVATAR OF KHAINE, CAULDRON OF BLOOD, Behemoth, Leader

        Damage Table: WoundTable0, WoundTable1, WoundTable2, WoundTable3, WoundTable4, WoundTable5, Prayer: Rune of Khaine, Touch of Death, Wrath of Khaine, Unit: Hag Queen on Cauldron of Blood, Unit Abilities: Animated, Bladed Impact, Bloodshield, Idol of Worship, Priestess of Khaine, Witchbrew, Weapon: Avatar of Khaine's Sword, Hag Queen's Blade of Khaine, Torrent of Burning Blood, Witch Aelves' Sacrificial Knives


        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        WoundTable0 Wounds SufferedMoveSacrificial KnivesBloodshield
        WoundTable1 0-26"818"
        WoundTable2 3-55"714"
        WoundTable3 6-84"610"
        WoundTable4 9-103"56"
        WoundTable5 11+2"42"
        Prayer Description Ref
        Rune of Khaine This model's Blade of Khaine has a Damage characteristic of D3 instead of 1 until your next hero phase.
        Touch of Death Pick a unit within 3" of this model and then hide a dice in one of your hands. Your opponent must pick a hand; if that hand is holding the dice, the unit you picked suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Wrath of Khaine Pick a friendly AVATAR OF KHAINE on the battlefield – until your next hero phase, it is now Animated.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Hag Queen on Cauldron of Blood *1385+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Animated This model cannot use its Torrent of Burning Blood or Avatar of Khaine’s Sword unless a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST used the Wrath of Khaine prayer to animate its statue of Khaine in your preceding hero phase.
        Bladed Impact Roll a dice if this model ends a charge move within 1" of any enemy units. On a 2+ the nearest enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Bloodshield The powerful magic that fuels the Cauldron of Blood grants it and nearby followers protection. The range of this ability is shown in the damage table above. Add 1 to saving throws for friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units that are wholly within this range of this model. A unit can only be affected by a single CAULDRON OF BLOOD’S Bloodshield ability at any one time.
        Idol of Worship Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units that are within 7" of any friendly AVATARS OF KHAINE.
        Priestess of Khaine In your hero phase, this model can pray once. If it does, pick a prayer it knows and roll a dice. On a result of 1 this model is found unworthy and suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 2 nothing happens. On a 3+ the prayer is successful and its effect takes place.
        Witchbrew Distilled from the blood of Slaughter Queens, witchbrew drives the imbiber into such an ecstasy of destruction that they will fight on in the face of impossible odds. In your hero phase, you can pick a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit within 3" of this model to drink witchbrew. If you do, then until your next hero phase you can re-roll failed wound rolls for that unit’s melee weapons, and you do not need to take battleshock tests for the unit.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Avatar of Khaine's Sword Melee2"43+3+-23
        Hag Queen's Blade of Khaine Melee1"43+4+-11
        Torrent of Burning Blood Missile10"63+3+-11
        Witch Aelves' Sacrificial Knives Melee1"*3+4+-1

      • Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine [480pts]

        Categories: AELF, HERO, WIZARD, MORATHI, HIGH ORACLE OF KHAINE, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, Leader, MORATHI, THE SHADOW QUEEN, MONSTER

        Command Trait: Worship Through Bloodshed, Damage Table: WoundTable0, WoundTable1, WoundTable2, WoundTable3, WoundTable4, WoundTable5, Magic: Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine, Morathi, The Shadow Queen, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Arnzipal’s Black Horror, Mystic Shield, Unit: Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine, Morathi, The Shadow Queen, Unit Abilities: Enchanting Beauty, Fly, Gaze of Morathi, Monstrous Revelation, Monstrous Transformation, Sorceress Supreme, The Iron Heart of Khaine, The Truth Revealed, Weapon: Bladed Wings, Crown of Serpents, Envenomed Tail, Gaze of Morathi, Heartrender (Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine), Heartrender (Morathi, The Shadow Queen)


        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Worship Through Bloodshed If Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine is your general, you can use this ability. If you do, pick up to 2 friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units within 14" of Morathi (you cannot choose Morathi herself). Those units can immediately shoot as if it were the shooting phase. Alternatively, if either unit is within 3" of an enemy unit, it can instead be chosen to pile in and attack as if it were the combat phase. The same unit cannot be picked to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase. Battletome: DoK Errata, June 2018
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        WoundTable0 Wounds SufferedMoveHeartrenderEnvenomed Tail
        WoundTable1 0-214"66
        WoundTable2 3-412"5D6
        WoundTable3 5-710"4D6
        WoundTable4 8-98"3D3
        WoundTable5 10+6"2D3
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine 3/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Arnzipal's Black Horror
        Morathi, The Shadow Queen 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Arnzipal's Black Horror
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Arnzipal’s Black Horror 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them, and roll a dice. On a 1 that unit suffers a mortal wound, on a 2 or 3 it suffers D3 mortal wounds, and on a 4+ it suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine 6"694+
        Morathi, The Shadow Queen *1294+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Enchanting Beauty Subtract 1 from the hit rolls of attacks that target Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Gaze of Morathi If a target is hit by the Gaze of Morathi, pick a model in the target unit and roll a dice. If the result exceeds that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
        Monstrous Revelation Morathi’s Shadow Queen model is not set up on the battlefield at the start of the battle. Instead, it is set up when Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine uses the Monstrous Transformation or The Truth Revealed ability (pg 76). When Morathi transforms, her High Oracle of Khaine model is removed from the battlefield and her Shadow Queen model is set up on the spot where she was standing before her transformation. Morathi’s Shadow Queen model can only be set up within 3" of an enemy unit if her High Oracle of Khaine model was within 3" of that unit before her transformation. If there is insufficient room to place Morathi exactly where she was standing before her transformation, simply place the model as close as possible to that spot where there is sufficient room. If, after her Shadow Queen model has been set up, Morathi is more than 14" away from the spot where she was standing before her transformation, she cannot move in the following movement phase. Any wounds allocated to Morathi in her High Oracle of Khaine form prior to her transformation are carried over to her Shadow Queen form and then doubled. For example, if 3 wounds had been allocated to Morathi in her High Oracle of Khaine form before she transformed, she would be set up in her Shadow Queen form with 6 wounds already allocated to her. Note that Morathi cannot transform back to her former aspect during the battle – once in her Shadow Queen form, she stays that way for the remainder of the battle. If Morathi was your general in her High Oracle of Khaine form, she remains your general in her Shadow Queen form but she loses the Worship Through Bloodshed command ability. Also note that Morathi in her Shadow Queen form loses the Sorceress Supreme and Enchanted Beauty abilities that she has in her High Oracle of Khaine form (pg 76), and she can attempt to cast and unbind fewer spells in her Shadow Queen form.
        Monstrous Transformation At the start of your hero phase, Morathi can transform into her monstrous aspect. See the Morathi, the Shadow Queen warscroll (pg 77) for a description of how Morathi transforms.
        Sorceress Supreme Add 1 to casting and unbinding rolls made for Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine. In addition, double the range of spells she attempts to cast.
        The Iron Heart of Khaine Morathi cannot be healed, but no more than 3 wounds can be allocated to her in any one turn. Any additional wounds and/or mortal wounds allocated to her in the same turn are negated and have no effect.
        The Truth Revealed If Morathi is wounded, there is a chance she will no longer be able to contain her wrath and will transform into her monstrous aspect. Roll a dice at the start of your hero phase. If the result is equal to or less than the number of wounds currently allocated to Morathi, she transforms as described on the Morathi, the Shadow Queen warscroll (pg 77).
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Bladed Wings Melee2"3+3+-11
        Crown of Serpents Melee1"53+3+-1
        Envenomed Tail Melee3"13+3+-2*
        Gaze of Morathi Missile6"12+***
        Heartrender (Morathi, High Oracle of Khaine) Melee2"33+3+-1D3
        Heartrender (Morathi, The Shadow Queen) Melee2"*3+3+-23

      • Slaughter Queen [100pts]

        Selections: 3. Smouldering Helm, 4. Crone Blade, 4. Purefire Brazier, 5. Covenant of the Iron Heart

        Categories: AELF, HERO, PRIEST, SLAUGHTER QUEEN, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, Leader, Artefact

        Artefact: Crone Blade, Purefire Brazier, Smouldering Helm, Command Trait: Orgy of Slaughter, Prayer: Covenant of the Iron Heart, Dance of Doom, Rune of Khaine, Touch of Death, Wrath of Khaine, Unit: Slaughter Queen, Unit Abilities: Pact of Blood, Priestess of Khaine, Weapon: Blade of Khaine, Deathsword


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Crone Blade Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons. Each time an enemy model is slain by an attack made with this weapon, you can heal 1 wound that has been allocated to the bearer. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p52
        Purefire Brazier In your shooting phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 9" of the bearer. On a 5+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Smouldering Helm Each time you make a successful save roll of 6+ for the bearer in the combat phase, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been made.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Orgy of Slaughter If this model is your general, you can use this ability. If you do, pick a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit within 14" of this model. If that unit is within 3" of an enemy unit, it can pile in and attack as if it were the combat phase. The same unit cannot be picked to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase. Battletome: DoK Errata, June 2018
        Prayer Description Ref
        Covenant of the Iron Heart Pick a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit within 14" of the priest. Until the start of your next hero phase, you do not need to take battleshock tests for that unit. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p55
        Dance of Doom Until your next hero phase, this model can be chosen to pile in and attack twice in the combat phase.
        Rune of Khaine This model's Blade of Khaine has a Damage characteristic of D3 instead of 1 until your next hero phase.
        Touch of Death Pick a unit within 3" of this model and then hide a dice in one of your hands. Your opponent must pick a hand; if that hand is holding the dice, the unit you picked suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Wrath of Khaine Pick a friendly AVATAR OF KHAINE on the battlefield – until your next hero phase, it is now Animated.

      • Slaughter Queen on Cauldron of Blood [330pts]

        Selections: 1. Catechism of Murder, 3. Magmadroth Blood Vials, 4. Crone Blade, 4. Ignax's Scales, 5. Khainite Pendant

        Categories: AELF, DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE, ORDER, TOTEM, HERO, PRIEST, WITCH AELVES, AVATAR OF KHAINE, CAULDRON OF BLOOD, SLAUGHTER QUEEN, Behemoth, Leader, Artefact

        Animated The Avatar of Khaine cannot move, cannot shoot and cannot be selected to fight unless a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE PRIEST used the Wrath of Khaine prayer to animate it in your preceding hero phase. Even if this model has not been animated it is still treated as a model in your army, with the exception that enemy units that begin their movement phase within 3" of it can either remain stationary or move normally – they do not have to retreat unless there is another enemy unit within 3" of them.

        Righteous Fervour In your hero phase, choose one DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit from this battalion and one STORMCAST ETERNAL unit from this battalion that are within 6" of each other. Both units can either make a normal move as if it were your movement phase, shoot as if it were your shooting phase, or pile in and attack as if it were the combat phase. Both units must perform the same action (if only one of the units is able to perform the action you chose – for example, if one of the units shoots but the other has no missile weapons – then the other unit does nothing).

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Daughters of Khaine

          Selections: Hagg Nar

          Rules: COMMAND TRAIT, WARSCROLL BATTALIONS

          Battle Trait: Blood Rites, Daughters of the First Temple, Fanatical Faith


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Blood Rites Friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE units gain an ability each battle round, as shown on the following list. Note that all abilities are cumulative. For example, in the second battle round, re-roll rolls of 1 when a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE unit runs and also when it charges. 1. Quickening Bloodlust: Re-roll run rolls of 1 for this unit. 2. Headlong Fury: Re-roll dice rolls of 1 when making charge rolls for this unit. 3. Zealot's Rage: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, if this unit is an AVATAR OF KHAINE, it always counts as being Animated (see the model’s warscroll). 4. Slaughterer's Strength: Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this unit. 5+ Unquenchable Fervour: Re-roll save rolls of 1 for this unit. In addition, you do not need to take battleshock tests for this unit. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p50
        Daughters of the First Temple Whilst a Hagg Nar unit is benefitting from the Zealot’s Rage ability from the Blood Rites battle trait (pg 50), you can re-roll all failed hit rolls for the unit instead of only re-rolling hit rolls of 1.
        Fanatical Faith Roll a dice each time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly DAUGHTERS OF KHAINE model. On a 6+ the wound is negated. Order Battletome: Daughters of Khaine p50

        Selections: Battle: Hysh

        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Aetheric Net 6If successfully cast, pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of the caster. Roll a dice for each unit (friend or foe) within 3" of that point. On a 4+ that unit suffers 1 mortal wound, and its Move characteristic is halved until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p78
        Banishment 8If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. Your opponent must remove that unit from the battlefield and then set it up again, anywhere on the battlefield more than 24" from the caster and more than 9" from any other models from the caster’s army. Malign Sorcery; Errata, July 2018 p78
        Exorcising Beam 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the enemy unit is a DAEMON or DEATH unit, it suffers D6 mortal wounds instead. Malign Sorcery p78
        Healing Glow 7If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 6" of the caster that is visible to them. Heal D3 wounds allocated to that unit. Malign Sorcery p78
        Light of Battle 5If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster. Do not take battleshock tests for that unit until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p78
        Vengeful Illumination 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target that unit until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p78

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)

Selection Rules

COMMAND TRAIT: A Hagg Nar general must have the Devoted Disciples command trait. ()

WARSCROLL BATTALIONS: A Hagg Nar Cauldron Guard battalion (pg 71) can also include 1 Avatar of Khaine (pg 79) or an additional CAULDRON OF BLOOD. ()
